observationText: The hTERT ipn02.3 2λ cell line was immortalized using both hTERT and mCdk4 transgenes, and has divided to at least passage 83 with no signs of senescence.
The hTERT ipn02.3 2λ cell line was obtained from ATCC and cultivated in DMEM with 10% FBS at 37C and 5% CO2.
The hTERT ipn02.3 2λ cell line was able to be single-cell cloned, indicating it could be propagated from a single founder cell.
